edu.sjsu.yazdankhah.crypto.util.ciphersysdatatypes

Class AesState

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.sjsu.yazdankhah.crypto.util.ciphersysdatatypes.AesState

  • public class AesState
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulates State data structure for AES cipher system.
    Author:
    ahmad

      • constructFromBinStr

        public static AesState constructFromBinStr(java.lang.String binStr)
        Returns a new object initialized with the given string of binary digits column-wise. Every cell of the matrix is filled with 8 binary digits. The size of the bare string should be (4 * 4 * 8). If it's bigger, then it will be truncated from the right, and if it's smaller, then it will be right-padded with 0's. The string might be formatted with underscores or spaces as separator for readability.
        Parameters:
        binStr - the given string of binary digits
        Returns:
        a new object

      • constructFromHexStr

        public static AesState constructFromHexStr(java.lang.String hexStr)
        Returns a new object initialized with the given string of hex digits column-wise. Every cell of the matrix is filled with 2 hex digits. The size of the bare string should be (4 * 4 * 2). If it's bigger, then it will be truncated from the right, and if it's smaller, then it will be right-padded with 0's. The string might be formatted with underscores or spaces as separator for readability.
        Parameters:
        hexStr - the given string of hex digits
        Returns:
        a new object
